definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Non American Express Cardmember companion surcharge $400 per person.
sentences.chinese: 非美國運通卡會員人士同行附加費每位$400。

sentences.english: High season surcharge may apply, please check with our company.
sentences.chinese: 旺季期間出發須繳附加費，詳程請向本公司查詢。

sentences.english: Pls disregard below instructions. You may send Debit Note for this surcharge.
sentences.chinese: 請漠視以下指示，你可以寄扣款單扣這些附加費。

sentences.english: TES shall have the right to select the carrier of its choice.
sentences.chinese: 工商業污水附加費應有權選擇其選擇的載體。

sentences.english: A surcharge is levied on late applications.
sentences.chinese: 遲交的申請要收取附加費。

sentences.english: The Results shall be subject to inspection and approval of TES.
sentences.chinese: 結果，應接受檢查和工商業污水附加費的批准。

sentences.english: South Korea routes do not account for the infant seat waive fuel surcharges .
sentences.chinese: 中韓航線的不佔座嬰兒免收燃油附加費。

sentences.english: Yuki, so there are two separate surcharges?
sentences.chinese: 雪，所以有兩個單獨的附加費？

sentences.english: You have to pay a high premium for express delivery.
sentences.chinese: 快遞須付高額的附加費。

sentences.english: Please consider to quote in net prices, without including any additional fees or transportation charges.
sentences.chinese: 請報不帶有人和附加費用或者運輸費用的淨價。

sentences.english: Shipments to Europe face similar increases.
sentences.chinese: 到歐洲的海上運輸面臨着相似的燃油附加費的增長。

sentences.english: But there are still additional fees for running instances and using bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 但對於運行中的實例和使用的貸款，還是有附加費用。

sentences.english: Above fare are exclusive of Passenger Handling Charge and Fuel Surcharge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目並不包括乘客港務費及燃油附加費。

sentences.english: The video rental shop has a late fee charge.
sentences.chinese: 錄像出租店收取過期附加費。
快洗服務要收50%的附加費。

sentences.english: A consultancy review of the trade effluent surcharge scheme was completed in April 1997.
sentences.chinese: 污水附加費計劃的顧問檢討已在一九九七年四月完成。

definition: to assign sb to a seat/to be allocated a place
to reduce payment/to annul (debts, bills, taxes etc)/to let sb off paying
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
